pages.title: Rich Soil
pages.text: Rich Soil is a enhanced verision of dirt/farmland when any growable plant is placed on Rich Soil, its growth will be randomly boosted, similar to the usage of Bone Meal. It can also be converted to Rich Soil Farmland which is also immune to mob trampling.

pages.info: To get Rich Soil you first need to craft Organic Compost and convert it to Rich Soil

pages.title: Getting Rich Soil
pages.text: To convert Organic Compost you need to decompose it over time by placing it in the world.$(br)The progress can also be speed up by:$(br)$(li)Brown and Red Mushrooms, and their $(l:basics/mushroom_colonies)Colonies$()$(li)Podzol and Mycelium$(li)Other blocks of Organic Compost$(li)Rich Soil, normal or farmland
The Process of transforming Organic Compost into Rich Soil.
